title: CreativeMarket - Simple Line Icons Pro
description:
I'm not sure if any of you guys remember but back in 2013 I released this icons freebie with a very minimalist style called Simple Line Icons. It was a fun little project and never expected to become so popular. Based on our community great feedback, we spent the last 6 months expanding the set and fine-tuning every icon to look perfect at various standard sizes, from 24px to 96px.

We strongly believe this icon pack gathers the most useful icons for your UI and web projects.

Here's why you'll love these icons:

Consistent, minimalist style great for UI/UX design
Each icon was meticulously crafted to align perfectly on 4 different pixel grids: 24px, 32px, 48px, 60px. No more fuzzy icons at small sizes!
Ready to use for web apps and websites: 24px, 32px, 48px, 64px
Ready to use for iOS apps:   ,   
Ready to use for Android apps: 24px-mdpi, 36px-hdpi, 48px-xhdp, 72px-xxhdpi, 96px-xxxhdpi
Stroke weight can be easily customized in Illustrator
All files and folders are neatly organized. Each icon is properly named.
With Simple Line Icons Pro you get:

Source Files:

AI (editable strokes, outlines) - 24px, 32px, 48px, 60px (6,610 icons)
PSD (vector paths) - 24px, 32px, 48px, 60px (6,610 icons)
EPS - 24px, 32px, 48px, 60px (6,610 icons)
Ready to Use Assets:

SVG (individual icons) - 24px, 32px, 36px, 48px, 60px, 64px, 72px, 90px, 96px (16,540 icons)
PNG (individual icons) - 24px, 32px, 36px, 48px, 60px, 64px, 72px, 90px, 96px (16,540 icons)
Web Font:

EOT, TTF, WOFF


INFORMATION: https://creativemarket.com/raul.taciu/381094-Simple-Line-Icons-Pro
